rooms.title: Our Rooms
rooms.subtitle: Comfort and Peace
rooms.shortDescription: Located by the riverside in the unique nature of Ayder, our bungalow offers guests a peaceful accommodation experience. Collect unforgettable memories in this special place where modern amenities meet traditional touch.
rooms.fullDescription: Our bungalow, located right by the river, allows you to wake up listening to the sounds of nature. Ideal for families and groups of friends with 45 m² of space and accommodation capacity for up to 7 people. All amenities including modern kitchen, private bathroom, heating system and high-speed WiFi are available. You can cross to the other side of the river via the wooden bridge and enjoy your breakfast on your private balcony.
rooms.bookingNote: Contact us via WhatsApp to make a reservation.
rooms.infoDescription: A peaceful vacation awaits you in the heart of nature in our carefully designed bungalow.

about.title: Get to Know Us
about.subtitle: Ayder Kuzey Houses Houses
about.description: Located by the riverside in the unique nature of Ayder, our boutique accommodation offers guests a peaceful escape. We create an environment where you can gather unforgettable memories by combining traditional Black Sea architecture with modern comfort.
about.mission: Our mission is to make every guest feel at home away from home, to experience the peace that nature offers in its purest form, and to share the unique hospitality of the Black Sea region.

features.natureDesc: We offer a peaceful accommodation experience in the heart of nature with our riverside location.
features.hospitalityDesc: As a family business, we see every guest as part of our family.
features.comfortDesc: While preserving traditional character, we offer all the amenities of modern living.
features.familyDesc: We provide an ideal environment for families, ensuring you can vacation safely with your children.

about.teamDescription: Our experienced and friendly team is here to make your stay unforgettable. We strive to provide you with the best service by thinking of every detail.
